content.rendered: This document provides supplemental guidance for energy modelling professionals preparing energy models to support Zero Carbon Building – Design Version 3 (ZCB-Design v3) certification.

excerpt.rendered: This document provides supplemental guidance for energy modelling professionals preparing energy models to…
